channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: Meta and Google could be about to sign a mega AI chip deal - and it could change everything in the tech space
item.description: Rising demand, shifting alliances, and limited fabrication capacity create unpredictable conditions as Meta considers a long-term Google TPU hardware partnership.

item.title: I tested 15 cases for the Switch 2 and these are the best
item.description: Editor’s note: Black Friday deals are still happening, so check out the latest and greatest discounts that today has to offer. You might find it kind of sad to put your hard-earned Switch 2 into a protective case. To me, it’s freeing. Using a case relieves me of the worry that it will accumulate tons of […]

item.title: James Cameron Has a Backup Plan for ‘Avatar’ If ‘Fire & Ash’ Flops
item.description: On the chance 'Fire & Ash' isn't as big a hit as the last two 'Avatar' movies, Cameron will find a way to wrap up the series.

item.title: The Fujifilm X Half is on sale for what it should have originally cost
item.description: Fujifilm’s unusual X Half elicited a lot of feelings from photographers when it came out earlier this year — from “That looks like so much fun,” to “Wait, it costs how much?“ Its $849.95 list price felt way too high for what is, by all accounts, a fun, unserious little point-and-shoot. But its $649 sale […]

item.title: Behold, the black Apple Watch Ultra 2 is $200 off during Black Friday
item.description: Last year, I wrote that you do not need a black Apple Watch Ultra 2. It was simply a color refresh, I said. The original Apple Watch Ultra on your wrist was still perfectly fine. The landfills of the world were better off without Apple’s first-gen ruggedized smartwatch filling it. Also, suggesting that you spend […]

item.title: I bought this $110 Nespresso rig and it’s been caffeinated bliss ever since
item.description: Before I went to Italy on vacation, I was fine with instant coffee and my electric kettle. I’m no coffee snob — just get that sweet caffeine into my veins as fast as humanly possible. item.title: The Android phone you should buy your dad is just $349
item.description: Not to generalize, but the Google Pixel 9A is a classic dad phone. It’s not fussy. It’s durable and scheduled to get software updates for the better part of a decade. It’s a solid deal at its full $499 MSRP, but the Black Friday price of $349 is even sweeter. It’s the lowest we’ve seen […]

item.title: I'm a big MacBook Pro fan, and you should get one for yourself at this record-low price
